item.title: Build: DigiDev
item.description: Buildlog: DigiDev ğŸ”—The Goal ğŸ”—Design a board using inexpensive 2-layer design. The Challenge ğŸ”—2-layer designs present challenges with RF compared to 4-layer designs, since the larger distance from signal layer to ground plane affects the RF negatively. The Result ğŸ”—Using the thinnest PCB stackup the board house offers, and adjusting the RF path accordingly, the board has excellent RF performance while being a more cost efficient alternative to 4-layer designs.
